title: Making Art Heals Hearts (Encore)
description:
Chelsea Phaire is an artist, philanthropist, and all around do-gooder. Last year, at just 10-years-old, Chelsea did something pretty extraordinary. And not only did it make a difference in her life, it helped thousands of other kids, too.

Learn more about Chelsea’s Charity and see how you can get involved at chelseascharity.com 

Follow Chelsea’s Charity on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
